function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consistent food truck scheduling","Impact":"Customer frustration and disappointment","Mitigation":"Establish a reliable and consistent food truck scheduling system","Technologies":"Scheduling software, online ordering platforms","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Inconsistent delivery times","Impact":"Customer dissatisfaction and inconvenience","Mitigation":"Implement a reliable and efficient delivery schedule with accurate time estimates","Technologies":"GPS tracking, route optimization software","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Lack of clear communication about orders","Impact":"Confusion and dissatisfaction among customers","Mitigation":"Use clear communication channels and provide updates on order status","Technologies":"Messaging apps, social media platforms","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck operators"}]}
